text: Q8. | [MSQ] Consider the following statements about HTTP: 1. A user requests a Web page that contains of some text and three images. For this page, the client will send one request message and receive four response messages. 2. Two distinct Web pages (for example, www.gateatzeal.com/research.html and www.gateatzeal.com/students.html) can be sent over the same persistent connection. 3. With non-persistent connections between browser and origin server, it is possible for a single TCP segment to carry two distinct HTTP request messages. 4. HTTP response messages never have an empty message body. Which of the above statements is/are true? (a) 1 and 2 only (b) 2 only (c) 2,3 and 4 only (d) 1, 3 and 4 only Solution: 1. It depends upon the. type of HTTP connection used persistent or non-persistent. 2. True two distinct web page can be sent over same persistent connection. 3. false,in non-persistent ,per connection single request will be there 4. false Answer is (B)
